General.Name: Benton Resources Inc
General.Description: Benton Resources Inc. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties. It explores for gold, silver, nickel, copper, platinum group elements, palladium, and lithium resources. The company's projects include the Far Lake project located west of Thunder Bay, Ontario; and the Abernethy property located southwest of Kenora, Ontario. It also has strategic alliance with Sokoman Minerals Corp. through three joint-venture properties, including Grey River Gold, Golden Hope, and Kepenkeck in Newfoundland. The company was incorporated in 2011 and is headquartered in Thunder Bay, Canada.
General.Address: 684 Squier Street, Thunder Bay, ON, Canada, P7B 4A8
